desc: (Best Prosecco)+(Best Rosé Prosecco) Bella Principessa is a superior tasting, impeccably well-presented luxury Prosecco that's delicious, light, vibrant and revitalising, with persistent, gentle bubbles that last (Premium Prosecco)+(Prosecco DOCG)+(prosecco doc rosé)+(prosecco doc)+(organic prosecco)+(sustainable)
